page.title: 12Leisure in Aston
page.content: Leisure activities in this area for children include football, netball, Judo, dancing classes,Youth Clubs, Church choirs, Cub Scouts, Brownies, Guides and Scouts.Adult leisure activities include yoga and aerobics classes, bingo, clay pigeon shooting, cricket, football and a silver brass band.There is a swimming pool sited at Aston Comprehensive School which is open to the public.There are several Old People's Homes where there are organised activities during the week Cub Scouts and Brownies are for boys and girls respectively of age 8 and upwards.The children are invested into these clubs, wear distinctive uniforms learn and are asked to follow a sensible code of conduct, earn badges once various skills are mastered (such as First Aid).Scouts and Guides are similar clubs for older boys and girls
